semantic_identifier: [GOLD-53]: Add attribution query API to correlate outcomes to positioning_version_id
title: Add attribution query API to correlate outcomes to positioning_version_id

sections.text: Implement a backend endpoint that returns outcome metrics (e.g., conversion, win/loss, churn) grouped by positioning_version_id with optional filters for segment/ICP, channel/artifact type, and time window. The API should support comparing two versions over the same period and return counts plus basic rates, using the persisted join key from GOLD-52. Ensure queries are indexed and return stable, paginated results suitable for powering an attribution report UI.
